name: Support/QA Engineer (Analytics Platform)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Support/QA engineer who is passionate about data analysis. You will be helping us to provide support for a set of data analysis tools and will work with our IDEs and the code as a QA to gain a better understanding of the user requests.

If you love to explain complex ideas in plain terms, enhance the user experience with simple and clear words, and are keen to help people improve their knowledge and image of the product – apply! You will have the opportunity to learn a lot about data analysis and its application, and you will be part of a team that helps our colleagues make data-driven decisions for their products. In other words, you will be influencing the future of JetBrains products and their users.

Responsibilities:

  • Helping users with data interpretation.

  • Helping users with web application usage.

  • Investigating data.

  • Verifying SQL queries.

  • Working with technical writers to prepare help documentation for internal use.

  • Manual testing of our product analytics service.

Basic qualifications:

  • At least 2 years of experience working for IT companies.

  • Good understanding of programming fundamentals, software engineering concepts, and processes.

  • Basic knowledge of Java.

  • Knowledge of SQL.

  • Experience with IDEs.

  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

  • Ability to work both in a team and independently, taking initiative with the corresponding planning and time-management skills.

  • Strong attention to detail.

  • Proficient English.

Bonus qualifications:

  • Proficient understanding of data analysis concepts.

  • Knowledge of any programming languages.

Our team:

Part of the JetBrains family, we work closely with the data analytics team to gain a better understanding of our customers and their needs. Our goal is to help other teams with data-based decision making.

About JetBrains:

At JetBrains, code is our passion. For over 20 years, we’ve been striving to make the strongest, most effective developer tools. By automating routine checks and corrections, our tools speed up coding and software development, freeing you to grow, discover, and create.

We offer:

  • Spacious comfortable office (open 24/7) with a private parking lot.
  • Competitive salary: determined individually, but above industry average.
  • Bonuses based on your performance.
  • Voluntary health insurance for employees, their spouse, and their children under age 18 (including dental insurance).
  • 5 weeks of paid vacation.
  • Full salary during sick leave.
  • Flexible work schedule.
  • Hot meals, free drinks, fruits, and snacks.
  • Office library with specialized work-related books and magazines.
  • Office gym (with washrooms).
  • Training, including English and German language classes.
  • Opportunities to travel to professional conferences in Europe and the US.
  • Job relocation help.
